page.title: 14CHURCHES
page.content: In the village of Sutterton there are 2 chapels and the church of St.Mary the Virgin.The church was founded in Saxon times but has been altered over the centuries.We interviewed Mr.J. Chesman the church warden and "lollipop man".Here are the questions that we asked him. {As church warden these are the jobs he {has to do,} {1.}church fabric {2.}maintain order {3.}seat congregation{4.}collections {5.}collate church affairs. It is 2 years since the last vicar retired and now the parish relies on retired clergymen.Mr. Chesman stated he would like to be a vicar but he needs training. Church hierachy is Bishop-Arch Deacon-Canons-Vicar-lay readers(can do weddings)-church wardens.The Algarkirk church is named St.Peter&Paul(Beridge family ref.p.2)
